label: 匁
本: Osaka: The Merchants' Capital of Early Modern Japan . Cornell University Press . 1999
著者: McClain, James L.  and Wakita Osamu
説明文: A measurement of weight(3.75 grams or 0.1325 ounces)and a unit of value for silver coins; one thousand monme equaled one kanme; the shogunate fixed an exchange rate of fifty(later sixty)monme of silver at one ryō of gold. [貫目、両]
